foreignData.name: Shessra, Flüstern des Todes
foreignData.text:
Verhexendes Flüstern — Wenn Shessra, Flüstern des Todes, ins Spiel kommt, blockt eine Kreatur deiner Wahl in diesem Zug, falls möglich.
Grabesflüstern — Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls in diesem Zug eine Kreatur gestorben ist, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Shessra, susurro de la muerte
foreignData.text:
Susurros embrujados — Cuando Shessra, susurro de la muerte entre al campo de batalla, la criatura objetivo bloquea este turno si puede.
Susurros del sepulcro — Al comienzo de tu paso final, si una criatura murió este turno, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Shessra, murmure de la mort
foreignData.text:
Murmures ensorcelants — Quand Shessra, murmure de la mort arrive sur le champ de bataille, une créature ciblée bloque ce tour-ci si possible.
Murmures de la tombe — Au début de votre étape de fin, si une créature est morte ce tour-ci, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
foreignData.type: Créature légendaire : humain et elfe et psychagogue

foreignData.name: Shessra, Sussurro della Morte
foreignData.text:
Sussurri Stregati — Quando Shessra, Sussurro della Morte entra nel campo di battaglia, una creatura bersaglio blocca in questo turno, se può farlo.
Sussurri dalla Tomba — All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se una creatura è morta in questo turno, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 死の囁き、シェスラ
foreignData.text:
魅力的な囁き — 死の囁き、シェスラが戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それは可能ならこれをブロックする。
墓所の囁き — あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンにクリーチャーが死亡していた場合、あなたは「２点のライフを支払い、カード１枚を引く。」を選んでもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・エルフ・邪術師

foreignData.name: 죽음의 속삭임, 셰스라
foreignData.text:
매혹적인 속삭임 — 죽음의 속삭임, 셰스라가 전장에 들어올 때, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 가능하면 이 턴에 방어한다.
무덤의 속삭임 — 당신의 종료단 시작에, 이 턴에 생물이 죽었다면, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Shessra, Sussurrante da Morte
foreignData.text:
Sussurros sedutores — Quando Shessra, Sussurrante da Morte, entra no campo de batalha, a criatura alvo bloqueia neste turno se estiver apta.
Lamento das sepulturas — No início de sua etapa final, se uma criatura morreu neste turno, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se fizer isso, compre um card.

foreignData.name: Шессра, Шепот Смерти
foreignData.text:
Чарующий шепот — Когда Шессра, Шепот Смерти выходит на поле битвы, целевое существо блокирует в этом ходу, если может.
Шепот могилы — В начале вашего заключительного шага, если в этом ходу умерло существо, вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 亡者嗫声谢丝拉
foreignData.text:
惑人低语～当亡者嗫声谢丝拉进战场时，目标生物本回合若能进行阻挡，则须如此作。
坟墓低语～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有生物死去，则你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。
foreignData.type: 传奇生物 ～人类／妖精／邪术师

foreignData.name: 亡者囁聲謝絲拉
foreignData.text:
惑人低語～當亡者囁聲謝絲拉進戰場時，目標生物本回合若能進行阻擋，則須如此作。
墳墓低語～在你的結束步驟開始時，若本回合中有生物死去，則你可以支付2點生命。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。
foreignData.type: 傳奇生物 ～人類／妖精／邪術師

name: Shessra, Death's Whisper
originalText:
Bewitching Whispers — When Shessra, Death's Whisper enters the battlefield, target creature blocks this turn if able.
Whispers of the Grave — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: If the creature affected by the Bewitching Whispers ability is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can't block, then it doesn't block. If there's a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to block in that case either.

Shessra, Death's Whisper's last ability will trigger only once during your end step, no matter how many creatures died this turn. However, if no creatures have died so far this turn as the end step begins, the ability won't trigger at all. It's not possible to cause a creature to die during the end step in time to have the ability trigger.

text:
Bewitching Whispers — When Shessra, Death's Whisper enters the battlefield, target creature blocks this turn if able.
Whispers of the Grave — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
